attributes.action: change alcester high school back to normal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in recent years alcester high school has changed, the pupils at this school believe this is damaging their education. So we as pupils at this school are asking the prime minister to change this for the good.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
